body:
An advisor from the [Children and Family Court Advisory and Support Service (Cafcass)]({app:urls:url:cafcass}) or [CAFCASS Cymru]({app:urls:url:cafcass-cymru}) will look at your answers as part of their background checks. 

Cafcass and CAFCASS Cymru protect the interests of children involved in family court cases.

The advisor will also contact organisations such as the police and local authorities to see if they have any information about you, the other person or your children. 

They then submit a report to the court before your first hearing. Their findings help the judge make a decision that is in the best interests of your children.

!abbr:cafcass!
